com.viaoa.object

Class OAObjectCacheFilter<T extends OAObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OAObjectCacheFilter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAFilter<T>, Serializable

    public class OAObjectCacheFilter<T extends OAObject>
extends Object
implements OAFilter<T>
    Listen to the OAObjectCache for objects that match filter criteria, and add to a Hub.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • bServerSideOnly

        protected boolean bServerSideOnly

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAObjectCacheFilter

        public OAObjectCacheFilter(Hub<T> hub)
        create an object cache filter, and have hub updated with all objects that match filter(s) and isUsed methods return true.

      • OAObjectCacheFilter

        public OAObjectCacheFilter(Hub<T> hub,
                           OAFilter<T> filter)
        Create new cache filter. Cached objects that are true for isUsedFromObjectCache & isUsed will be added to hub.
        Parameters:
        hub - if size is equal to 0, then refresh will be called. Otherwise refresh will not be called, since it's assumed that the objects were preselected.

      • OAObjectCacheFilter

        public OAObjectCacheFilter(Hub<T> hub,
                           OAFilter<T> filter,
                           String... dependentPropPaths)

    • Method Detail

      • setServerSideOnly

        public void setServerSideOnly(boolean b)
        This is so that changes on the hub will be published to the clients, even if initiated on OAClientThread.

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(OAFilter<T> f)
        Add a filter that is used to determine if an object from the cache will be added to hub. This will clear and refresh hub.
        Parameters:
        f - filter to add. By default isUsed() will return false if any of the filters.isUsed() returns false.
        See Also:
        that has an option for refreshing.

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(OAFilter<T> f,
                      String... dependentPropPaths)

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(OAFilter<T> f,
                      boolean bCallRefresh)
        Add a filter that is used to determine if an object from the cache will be added to hub.
        Parameters:
        f - filter to add. By default isUsed() will return false if any of the filters.isUsed() returns false.
        bCallRefresh - if true, then call refresh.

      • reselectAndRefresh

        public void reselectAndRefresh()

      • reselect

        protected void reselect()
        called internally so that data can be reselected from datasource.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Clear hub and check all cached objects to see if they should be added to hub. To be added, isUsedFromObjectCache() and isUsed() must return true.

      • addDependentProperty

        public void addDependentProperty(String prop)
        add a property to listen to. If the property changes, then it will be recalculated to determine if it should be added to hub, or removed from it. This will recheck the object cache to see if any of the existing objects isUsed() is true and should be added to hub. It will not call refresh.

      • addDependentProperty

        public void addDependentProperty(String prop,
                                 boolean bRefresh)

      • setupTrigger

        protected void setupTrigger()

      • close

        public void close()

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • isUsed

        public boolean isUsed(T obj)
        Called to see if an object should be included in hub. By default, this will return false if no filters have been added, or the result of the filters.
        Specified by:
        isUsed in interface OAFilter<T extends OAObject>
